column3: text
Ever since your father was imprisoned for illegally using company money to fund his 'Magical Girl Queendom' loot box addiction things have been tough.
You've had to move into your Japanese Aunts house and transfer schools.
Being a transfer student makes it really hard to make friends but your charming looks and personality will help you through your first day.
I just want to meet some people and make friends as soon as possible - loneliness is not my aesthetic
The girl in front of you has who has been doodling all lesson in her black 'Goth is Life - Death is acceptable' titled notebook drops her pen.
This is the perfect opportunity -  you pick up her pen and hand it to her - it has her name inscribed on its base 'Hellga'
Hi I'm-
Don't even
column5: I haven't even said anything yet

column3: Listen here - Fresh Meat. Don't even try to speak to me - being attractive doesn't give you authority to talk to me
I was just trying to introduce myself
There you go running your mouth again - here's some advice - you're hotter when you keep quiet
column5: I'm honestly not sure if that was supposed compliment or a threat

column3: Meet me at the bar after school - if you leave me waiting you'll regret it
That was so damn weird - that was the first person I've spoken to in this school I hope that there are some less weird students around - yikes
You continue on with your day alone - thinking about the odd 'friend' that you've made - at least someone has given you attention.
It's all good because your vibe is too good for you to vibe solo - more friends will come your way
A boy approaches you gleefully - you notice his soft smile and the hardcover book in his grasp titled 'I'm not like other guys - A guide to pick up culture'
Hey hey - You must be the transfer student
Yeah - I'm new around here
column9: That's a little presumptuous - but ok

column3: I'm Reegan - nice to meet you and everything - I know we've literally just met but I absolutely love your energy - there's something about you that makes me smile
I know it's hard for you to move to a new country - especially a rough area around 1107 Saito street but I'm here if you need anything
How do you know my address? I've never met you before
I spoke to your aunt while I was doing my big shop for the week. I know - I'm a bit different to other guys.
I really - really like shopping -  I go every single Thursday without fail and it takes up my whole day - I wouldn't miss it for literally anything
I want to get to know you more - we should go to the school gardens tomorrow and have a chat
column9: I wouldn't want to interrupt your life-changing shopping spree

column3: Did I say I go shopping on Thursday - I meant Friday. Im such a silly goofball. I can't wait to see you tomorrow you seem like an amazing person.
You arrive at the bar as instructed - it's a lot moodier and darker than all the other student bars you've been to before - just enough light to consume illicit substances without being caught.
This place is seems like bad news but you're thirsty for new companions and your optimistic spirit and positive outlook on life will help you through this anxiety-inducing experience.
You spot Hellga at the bar alone
You took long enough - I literally can't with inconsiderate people
I'm actually on time
But you left me waiting so you're not - anyways have a seat before you spoil the vibe
The bartender addresses you and asks you for your order - Hellga interjects immediately
A bloody mary for me - and the same for them
column5: Excuse you - I can order for myself
column9: I haven't gotten to look at the menu yet

column3: Maybe if you arrived on time you would have the privilege of choice
This has been so weird - I've been here for less than 10 minutes and the idea of going home is looking promising but I don't even feel safe there since that oddly nice guy knows my address.
You should be glad -  I've chosen you to be my personal entertainment for a while just you and me going places and having a fun time
column9: Wait a minute - are you into me? I thought that you were acting weird but I didn't know why

column3: Call it any label you want. I won't entertain it but you can choose to believe what you want.
There's no denying that you're hot but I don't know you that well - I hope that I can see you again
You head home to try and wake up bright and early for your meeting with Reegan in the garden
But because you're a mindful person who cares about their mental health - you decide to sleep in. Sadly you have to miss breakfast to get there on time
Thanks for meeting me - I brought you a sandwich
You did? Why?
You silly goose- I know you skipped breakfast this morning.
*silence*
How did you know that?
I'm an empath
So tell me about yourself
column5: I'm into reading disturbing erotica- going to bars and Panic! At the disco
column9: I'm into crochet and astrology. I'm a Delta Venus Omega Luna Caprisun

column3: Cool. I didn't expect that from you
You don't really know what he meant by that - I mean he's only just met you so what would he be expecting?
Every word he said gave you a weird feeling that you've already met. Not just the day before but somehow like he already knows you as a person.
I thought you were an empath?
Oh yeah.
Okay well-
You see Reegan checking his phone somewhat frequently
I'm sorry- am I disturbing something?
No no - not at all. I'm just expecting a call from a doctor - with some serious results.
Why did you organise a date during that then?
So this is a date? ;)
His boldness catches you off guard - but not necessarily puts you off
Possibly.. But if you have a phone call..
Don't worry about that - I can call them back
But it's the doctors - you need to-
I can call them back.
So do you wanna go on a walk or stay at the park?
You continue on with your date with Reagan and both enjoy yourselves - he seems perfect. Knows exactly what to say - what your favourite foods are and where the best spots are
You'd be happy to continue this relationship with more caution of your personal details
%commence_ending%
